001package io.github.ai4ci.example;
002
003import java.io.IOException;
004import java.nio.file.Files;
005import java.nio.file.Path;
006import java.util.Arrays;
007
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
009import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
010import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.SerializationFeature;
011import com.github.victools.jsonschema.generator.Option;
012import com.github.victools.jsonschema.generator.OptionPreset;
013import com.github.victools.jsonschema.generator.SchemaGenerator;
014import com.github.victools.jsonschema.generator.SchemaGeneratorConfigBuilder;
015import com.github.victools.jsonschema.generator.SchemaVersion;
016import com.github.victools.jsonschema.module.jackson.JacksonModule;
017
018import io.github.ai4ci.config.ImmutableExperimentConfiguration;
019
020/**
021 * A small utility to write example configuration files for all experiments and
022 * a JSON schema for the configuration file format. The output directory is
023 * provided as the first argument to the program.
024 *
025 * This is executed as part of the maven build process to ensure that example
026 * configuration files and the JSON schema are always up to date with the code.
027 * The generated files are committed to the repository and can be used as
028 * templates for new experiments and for validating configuration files.
029 *
030 */
031public class WriteExampleConfig {
032
033        /**
034         * Writes example configuration files for all experiments and a JSON schema
035         * for the configuration file format. The output directory is provided as the
036         * first argument to the program.
037         *
038         * @param args the first argument is the path to the output directory
039         * @throws RuntimeException if the output directory cannot be created or if
040         *                          no output directory is provided
041         *
042         */
043        public static void main(String[] args) {
044
045                if (args.length == 0) {
046                        throw new RuntimeException(
047                                        "Please provide a path to the output directory as the first argument."
048                        );
049                }
050
051                var d = Path.of(args[0])
052                        .resolve("examples");
053
054                System.out.println(
055                        "Writing example configuration files and JSON schema to "
056                                        + d.toAbsolutePath()
057                );
058
059                try {
060                        if (!Files.exists(d.resolve(".nojekyll"))) {
061                                Files.createFile(d.resolve(".nojekyll"));
062                        }
063                } catch (IOException e) {
064                        throw new RuntimeException(
065                                        "Could not create .nojekyll file in output directory.", e
066                        );
067                }
068
069                Arrays.stream(Experiment.values())
070                        .forEach((a) -> {
071                                try {
072                                        Files.createDirectories(d.resolve(a.name));
073                                        var tmp = d.resolve(a.name)
074                                                .resolve("config.json");
075                                        System.out.println(
076                                                "Writing example configuration for " + a.name + " to "
077                                                                + tmp.toAbsolutePath()
078                                        );
079                                        a.config
080                                                // .withSetupReplications(5)
081                                                // .withExecutionReplications(5)
082                                                .writeConfig(tmp, true);
083                                } catch (Exception e) {
084                                        throw new RuntimeException(e);
085                                }
086                        });
087
088                var objectMapper = new ObjectMapper();
089                objectMapper.enable(SerializationFeature.INDENT_OUTPUT);
090
091//              SchemaFactoryWrapper visitor = new SchemaFactoryWrapper();
092//              try {
093//                 objectMapper.acceptJsonFormatVisitor(
094//                                 objectMapper.constructType(ImmutableExperimentConfiguration.class), visitor);
095//                 JsonSchema jsonSchema = visitor.finalSchema();
096//                 objectMapper.writeValue(directory.resolve("schema.json").toFile(), jsonSchema);
097//                 // System.out.println(objectMapper.writerWithDefaultPrettyPrinter().writeValueAsString(jsonSchema));
098//               } catch (JsonProcessingException jsonEx) {
099//                 throw new RuntimeException();
100//               }
101
102                {
103                        var module = new JacksonModule();
104                        var configBuilder = new SchemaGeneratorConfigBuilder(
105                                        // SchemaVersion.DRAFT_7,
106                                        SchemaVersion.DRAFT_2020_12, OptionPreset.PLAIN_JSON
107                        ).with(
108                                Option.SCHEMA_VERSION_INDICATOR,
109                                Option.DEFINITIONS_FOR_ALL_OBJECTS,
110                                Option.DEFINITIONS_FOR_MEMBER_SUPERTYPES,
111                                Option.DEFINITION_FOR_MAIN_SCHEMA
112                        )
113                                .with(module);
114                        var config = configBuilder.build();
115                        var generator = new SchemaGenerator(config);
116                        JsonNode jsonSchema = generator
117                                .generateSchema(ImmutableExperimentConfiguration.class);
118                        try {
119                                objectMapper.writeValue(
120                                        d.resolve("schema.json")
121                                                .toFile(),
122                                        jsonSchema
123                                );
124                        } catch (Exception e) {
125                                throw new RuntimeException(e);
126                        }
127                }
128
129        }
130
131}
